name: Snake Eyes: Power Gauntlet
description:
Use your Dice of Power to fight off waves of evil Snake Eyes. Kill as many as you can in this Quake/Devil Daggers inspired game!

Rolling your dice across the battlefield, you'll be able to take advantage of two different attack modes: Sets of dice (Even just one) will summon spears from the pips, while a run of consecutive dice will unleash a powerful chain lightning attack.

Place your dice well, move intelligently, and spring disastrous traps on your enemies!

This was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was: Roll of the Dice.

Resources used:

  • Dice Model by Uğur Yılmaz (free3d.com)
  • Eye Model by die2i (free3d.com)
  • Ground textures from poliigon
  • "Inlanders" and "Robot Crush" fonts from dafont.com

Sounds created in Audacity using samples from freesound.org:

  • Autumn wind and dry leaves.wav from Stek59
  • low_machine_hum.wav by Foxicity
  • Laser Charging by plasterbrains
  • Electricity by FlashTrauma
  • button by Leszek_Szary
  • creature by Leszek_Szary
  • jumping_1.wav by ShaneF91
  • Voice_AdultMale_PainGrunts_07.wav by MrFossy
  • harpoon stabbing through snow and ice various.wav by kyles
  • swoosh-2.mp3 by lesaucisson
  • Footsteps_Dirt_Single_05.wav by BenDrain
  • Footsteps_Dirt_Single_07.wav by BenDrain
  • Poof.wav by ryansitz
  • Thud4.wav by yummy9987
  • Badge Coin Win by steaq

Game created in Unity.
